statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM inventory ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM inventory WHERE product_price < 50.00
SELECT product_name, product_quantity, product_price FROM inventory ORDER BY product_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM inventory WHERE product_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_price < 100.00 AND product_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, SUM(product_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, last_updated FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_availability WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT product_id, last_checked FROM product_availability ORDER BY last_checked ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, is_available FROM inventory JOIN product_availability ON inventory.product_id = product_availability.product_id WHERE is_available=true;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_description FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, updated_at FROM blockchain_updates ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND location = 'Main Warehouse';
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, b.updated_at FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN blockchain_updates b ON p.product_id = b.product_id WHERE i.quantity <= 50;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 200;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT store_name, total_sales FROM e-commerce_stores WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT product_id, available FROM product_availability WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT update_id, product_id, update_description FROM blockchain_updates ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, a.available FROM inventory p JOIN product_availability a ON p.product_id = a.product_id WHERE a.available = TRUE;
SELECT e.store_name, SUM(s.total_sales) AS total_revenue FROM e-commerce_stores e JOIN e-commerce_stores s ON e.store_id = s.store_id GROUP BY e.store_name;

SELECT b.product_id, b.update_description, b.update_time, p.product_name FROM blockchain_updates b JOIN inventory p ON b.product_id = p.product_id WHERE b.update_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductAvailability WHERE available_quantity > 0;

SELECT store_name, product_name, stock_quantity FROM EcommerceStores JOIN StoreInventory ON EcommerceStores.store_id = StoreInventory.store_id JOIN Inventory ON StoreInventory.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price, last_update FROM Inventory INNER JOIN ProductAvailability ON Inventory.product_id = ProductAvailability.product_id ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM EcommerceStores WHERE store_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT product_id, available_quantity, last_update FROM ProductAvailability WHERE available_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY available_quantity ASC;
SELECT Inventory.product_name, StoreInventory.stock_quantity FROM Inventory JOIN StoreInventory ON Inventory.product_id = StoreInventory.product_id WHERE StoreInventory.stock_quantity < 10;
